includedInDataCatalog.description: A data catalog which contains this dataset. Supersedes includedDataCatalog, catalog. Inverse property: dataset.

measurementTechnique.description: A technique, method, or technology used in an Observation, StatisticalVariable, or Dataset. This property helps clarify how a measuredProperty was measured.

citation.description: A citation or reference to another creative work, such as another publication, web page, or scholarly article.

conditionsOfAccess.description: Conditions that affect the availability of or access to an item. This property is expressed in natural language and is not suitable for use as a general web access control mechanism.

creator.description: The creator or author of this CreativeWork. This is the same as the Author property for CreativeWork.

dateCreated.description: The date on which the CreativeWork was created or the item was added to a DataFeed.

dateModified.description: The date on which the CreativeWork was most recently modified or when the item's entry was modified within a DataFeed.

datePublished.description: The date of first publication or broadcast of the CreativeWork.

keywords.description: Keywords or tags used to describe the item. Multiple entries are typically delimited by commas.

maintainer.description: A maintainer of a Dataset or software package. This is a Person or Organization that manages contributions or publication of the artifact.

alternateName.description: An alias or alternative name for the item.
